Male Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Urethral Diseases/Urethral Obstruction
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Partial or complete blockage in any part of the URETHRA that can lead to difficulty or inability to empty the URINARY BLADDER. It is characterized by an enlarged, often damaged, bladder with frequent urges to void.
